thread.title: PIrates beat Bears, complete weekend sweep
thread.title_full: PIrates beat Bears, complete weekend sweep

title: PIrates beat Bears, complete weekend sweep
text:
PIrates beat Bears, complete weekend sweep PIrates beat Bears, complete weekend sweep Post to Facebook PIrates beat Bears, complete weekend sweep PIrates beat Bears, complete weekend sweep  //on.wcsh6.com/1LEqRuh   PIrates beat Bears, complete weekend sweep Pirates beat Bears again WCSH Johnny Mehler, WCSH 7:03 p.m. EDT October 18, 2015 The Pirates get one point as playoff push tightens (Photo: wcsh) CONNECT TWEET   
PORTLAND, Maine 
(NEWS CENTER) -- The new-look Portland Pirates team settled into its new home fairly quick this weekend. 
After beating the Hershey Bears in their home opener, the Pirates were back on the ice against them on Sunday looking to complete the weekend sweep. 
Rob Schremp started the scoring in the first period with a blast from the right circle. The power play goal gave the Pirates a 1-0 lead. 
After a Kyle Rau goal in the second period, Schremp lit the lamp again for his second goal of the day and a 3-0 lead for the home team. 
Portland would go on to win, 5-2, finishing with a two-win weekend at the Cross Insurance Arena. 
The Pirates are back in action Friday night when they host Albany. Read or Share this story: http://on.wcsh6.com/1LEqRuh TOP VIDEOS
